name: Studio Legale de Capoa e Associati Reviews

review.title: “Potential for development, but terrible organization.”
review.pros: Pros – Some charismatic people, some quite well-trained.
review.cons: Cons – Somewhat an unfit attitude toward foreign offices. Very very bad salaries. No career development. To some extent, people were used, and not in a good sense.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
